title: Kris Jenner means business in black jacket and leather trousers as she heads to lunch
text:
Momager Kris Jenner recently managed to get all her girls together for an iconic magazine cover.

She was joined by Kim, Kourtney, Khloé, Kendall and Kylie for a CR Fashion Book cover shoot, their first joint magazine cover in two years.

But it was only Khloé and Kendall who joined mom Kris for lunch Friday at Emilio's Trattoria, with special guest Scott Disick.

Lunch with mom: Khloé Kardashian and Kendall Jenner joined mom Kris for lunch Friday at Emilio's Trattoria, with special guest Scott Disick

Kris went high-fashion business woman chic in a black suede blazer with matching leather pants and a black alligator Birkin.

Kendall sported a slate grey jacket, distressed at the hem, with matching high-waisted pants and a lilac t-shirt.

Scott kept it casual in a black sweatshirt with navy blue slacks and white leather sneakers, finishing the look with a pair of black wayfarers.

Khloé was a bit late to lunch, pulling up in her black Mercedes-Benz, while rocking a sickening pink manicure.

Momager chic: Kris went high-fashion business woman chic in a black suede blazer with matching leather pants and a black alligator Birkin

Model daughter: Kendall sported a slate grey jacket, distressed at the hem,

Special guest: Scott kept it casual in a black sweatshirt with navy blue slacks and white leather sneakers, finishing the look with a pair of black wayfarers

She stepped out in an oversized black duster, which she wore with strappy black stilettos, while carrying a baby blue Birkin.

Khloé made an appearance on Scott's Instagram story earlier in the day, as they filmed a joint confessional for Keeping Up with the Kardashians.

The Kardashian and Jenner women recently graced the cover of CR Fashion Book together, looking chic and sexy in black and white looks.

CR founder and editor-in-chief Carine Roitfeld said in a statement: 'I chose to have the Kardashian-Jenner women on the cover of this issue as they perfectly embody our theme of public vs. private.

Fashionably late: Khloé was a bit late to lunch, pulling up in her black Mercedes-Benz, while rocking a pink manicure

Incognito: She stepped out in an oversized black duster, which she wore with strappy black stilettos, while carrying a baby blue Birkin

On set: She and Kris entered through the back of the restaurant, as they were surrounded by the Keeping Up with the Kardashians crew

Monochromatic: Kendall wore a matching high-waisted pants with a lilac t-shirt

Behind-the-scenes: Khloé made an appearance on Scott's Instagram story earlier in the day, as they filmed a joint confessional for the reality show

'They live their private lives publicly and have done so for over a decade. It’s also rare to see all of the girls together in the same editorial, so it was a pleasure to have them all involved.'

It was the first magazine cover they'd all appeared in together in two years, the last time being The Hollywood Reporter in 2017.

Before that, they all posed together in white for the cover of Cosmopolitan back in 2015.

Cover girls: The Kardashian and Jenner women recently graced the cover of CR Fashion Book together, looking chic and sexy in black and white looks

Family photos: It was the first magazine cover they'd all appeared in together in two years, the last time being The Hollywood Reporter in 2017. Before that, they all posed together in white for the cover of Cosmopolitan back in 2015
description: The Kardashian and Jenner women recently graced the cover of CR Fashion Book together, looking chic and sexy in black and white looks for  their first joint cover in two years.
